title: Isis in Darkness - the name Marjorie

content.question: The primary significance in the passage of the name “Marjorie” in the third sentence of the ninth paragraph (“Selena . . . forget it”) is that it

choices.label: mars the perfection of an image that Richard has created
causes Richard to break a promise he had made to himself
jeopardizes Selena’s respectable reputation among her peers
ameliorates Richard’s fear that he has failed as a writer

content.answer: mars the perfection of an image that Richard has created

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
